# **Welcome to the world of multilevel models**

On this website you will find all the materials for the Multilevel Modelling course of the SGSSS Summer School 2023.

This six-hour workshop will give you an introduction to Multilevel Modelling through a mixture of traditional lectures and hands-on sessions, where we put the concepts into practice.

</br>

## Outline

- A brief overview of linear regression
- Multilevel data structures and examples
- Variance components and group-specific estimates
- Accounting for individual and group characteristics: fixed effects
- Multilevel modelling for binary responses
- Differential processes between groups: random effects

</br>
